response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth an investment of $1,000,000 to you. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and comes with a comprehensive warranty and support package. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business goals. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
